Man]] of [[Rohan]] played by [[Bruce Allpress]] who fought in the [[Battle of the Hornburg]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''. He prematurely shot his arrow and killed an [[Uruk-hai]] soldier, triggering the [[Orcs
column3: Orc]] Army's charge on the fortress. It is not known if he survived the battle.
